name: atom-task-management
description: Full-stack task management application with Angular and NestJS

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:all && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run ng lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
